speaker.whotheyare: Chris McKnett helps institutional investors put money toward sustainable and socially-forward assets.
speaker.whylisten: At State Street Global Advisors, Chris McKnett thinks deeply about how large investors, like banks, pension funds and endowments, can put their money in the right places -- not just for better business, but for a better world. In his role as the head of State Street Global Advisors' Environmental, Social and Governance Investing (ESG), McKnett develops sustainable-strategic products and integrates sustainability thinking directly into the investment process.
